# [3.5.0](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/compare/3.4.0...3.5.0) (2025-12-05)


### Bug Fixes

* backtracking in forwarded message pattern ([64afc34](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/64afc346a87db39ceb66bfda477be0dcaff0f84f))
* urls drop edge case ([eaebe71](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/eaebe712643fa4d5f64ebeccacb131b7f6952804))


### Features

* email extras added to sdk for apps needing email processing work ([6b353fc](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/6b353fc86e0083d2c9849055ac2a34b7301db26b))
* rfc5322 email processing helpers added ([4576b7e](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/4576b7ed0509ee3cff626e28147605e85158cf0c))





# [3.5.0](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/compare/3.4.0...3.5.0) (2025-12-05)
